Articles.Content:
I am having issues with RCS that I can't figure out. If no engine has been activated than RCS responds to throttle control, firing in the heading direction and with throttle controllable thrust. I also can't disable any RCS ports. In the VAB it says they are disabled but they still work when launched and once the ship is launched there isn't even a button on the right click menu. This is true for all the RCS thrusters I have.

It's a very heavy modded install but I can't find anything that would mess with RCS like this. The only RCS related mods I have other than parts are tweakable everything and rcsbuildaid. After some searching I found ModuleRCSFX on the forums and it seems to have the throttle functionality but I don't have it installed. Is it possible another mod implemented it and is causing the issue?

Thanks for any help.

EDIT: After doing a search for "RCS" in all the config files I found out that MechJeb is responsible for the throttle behaviour. Since I don't actually use MJ I uninstalled it. But the problem of disabling RCS jets is still there. I should add that I can disable them using action groups (Is there no toggle option? It is either enable or disable for all of mine).

EDIT2: The remaining problem seems to be an issue with tweakable everything. There is a .dll on page 44 of the mod thread that semi solves the issue. Guess I should have done a bit more searching before posting, hopefully this can help others.

Edited January 23, 2015 by mreadshaw
